Whatever the reasons she or her lawyer want to make for the reassignment, moving principles and other administrators around from school to school within the district, is and has been common practice.  Some schools are not the right fit for every principle and the district usually wants to give them a chance at more than one school before making final judgment on performance.  Unfortunately, some good performers who are making big differences at schools get moved around along with the under achievers.
